definitions.definition: Deficiency in amount or quality ; a falling short ; lack .
examples: The crop output this year has been comparatively small, owing to the deficit in rainfall.

definitions.definition: A situation wherein, or amount whereby, spending exceeds (e.g. government) revenue.

main_definition: Deficiency in amount or quality ; a falling short ; lack .
secondary_definitions: A situation wherein, or amount whereby, spending exceeds (e.g. government) revenue.
